alert.note: Alert for Conway; Southern Pope County; Yell Excluding Northwest (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 11 at 8:00PM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Conway, northeastern Yell and southeastern Pope Counties through 830 PM CST... At 759 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Petit Jean River WMA, or 10 miles south of Russellville, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Russellville... Dardanelle... Atkins... Pottsville... Hector... Carden Bottoms... Happy Bend... Galla Creek WMA... Hattieville... Jerusalem... Appleton... Birta... Lakeview in Yell County... Holla Bend... Mt George... Pontoon... Wonderview... Centerville... Gum Log... Economy... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Conway; Southern Pope County; Yell Excluding Northwest
